so you can open notepad,photoshop,itunes and ie all at the sametime?   and are you running them seamlessly or in the vm console
if you start a virtual machine then it is run in the background until you stop it or shutdown
or you can set it up to start individual vm in the startup script
i use seamless remote desktop desktop
it just work, though the session is your os limitation
there was an xp sp1 update that remove this limit in xp
why don't you have your start menu open?
